channel.title: Does anyone know how to change the settings on ancients multi hit spells?
channel.description:
How can i set multi-targeted spells to only hit a max of 3 players (i would rather have it hit only 1 person instead of all)
also, if anyone has the code for ancient ice attacks to freeze opponent i would be highly gratefull
i have looked for awhile now and i cant seem to find any help on this subject
--
how is this incorrectly asked? its a simple question.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2008, 05:08:44 pm[/size][hr]first and last bump..
